title: new​
content: </> AlertLibrary:new( player: Player ,-- Player to be sent title: string,-- Title of the alert description: string,-- Description of the alert close: string,-- The close button textDefualt: "Close" lightTheme: boolean-- Whether it should be light theme or no Defualt: false ) → () Creates an alert to a single player.

title: new​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:new() → () Creates a new switch

title: setParent​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setParent(t: Instance ) → () Sets the parent of the switch

title: setLock​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setLock(t: boolean?) → () Set whether the switch should response when the user clicked

title: setPosition​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setPosition(y: UDim2 ) → () Sets the position of the switch

title: setAnchorPoint​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setAnchorPoint(y: Vector2 ) → () Sets the AnchorPoint property of the switch

title: setSize​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setSize(y: UDim2 ) → () Sets the Size of the switch

title: setPadding​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setPadding( x: number, y: number ) → () Sets the padding of the switch button

title: setBgColor​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setBgColor(x: Color3 ) → () Sets the background color of switch

title: setCorner​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setCorner(c: UDim ) → () Sets the CornerRadius property of the switch

title: setButtonColor​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setButtonColor(c: Color3 ) → () Sets the switch toggler color

title: noTween​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:noTween() → () Removes tween for switch toggler movement

title: tween​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:tween() → () Adds tween for switch toggler movement

title: setEnableColor​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setEnableColor(c: Color3 ) → () Sets the switch toggler color when enabled

title: setDisableColor​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setDisableColor(c: Color3 ) → () Sets the switch toggler color when disabled

title: setButtonCorner​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setButtonCorner(c: UDim ) → () Sets the button corner (switch toggler)

title: setBorder​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setBorder(c: UIStroke ) → () Sets the main border of the switch

title: setButtonSize​
content: </> SwitchLibrary:setButtonSize(x: number) → () Sets the switch toggler size

title: SwitchReturnLibrary
content: On this page SwitchReturnLibrary A library stores the properties and functions of the switch

title: Description​
content: This module is to help developers to develop normal UIs

title: Example
content: -- LocalScript (Recommended) local player = game:GetService"Players".LocalPlayer local _L = require(path.to.BetterUI).Switch -- Replace with the BetterUI Interface you placed into! ReplicatedStorage is recommended. local gs = player.PlayerGui.gameGui -- what your gui named (Gui Instance is required for it to work!!!) local g = _L.new() g:setParent(gs) -- replace with the parent you want to set!! g:setPosition(UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0)) g:setAnchorPoint(Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)) g:setSize(UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 30)) -- Replace with scale if you want. g:setPadding(5, 5) g:setBgColor(Color3.new(0.001, 0.001, 0.001)) g:setCorner(UDim.new(0, 2048)) g:setEnableColor(Color3.fromRGB(0, 255, 0)) g:setDisableColor(Color3.fromRGB(255, 0, 0)) g:setButtonCorner(UDim.new(0, 2048)) g:setButtonSize(0.5)
